How do u get these memes and stuff to show up like this. I can only ever posts links.

Right click on the image (If you are in google images or another search engine, you have to view the image at it's website or at it's own url) and select "Copy image location". Then just paste it into your post. There are a few websites that won't work on the Boards for some reason, but you can take the image/gif and put it through another image/gif generator and use that.
You ask Rito to publish them for you.
